Ok I'ma be honest and say I'm a killer main... well this is a miserable time to play killer. Boons counter hexes too much, hold W meta, flashlight clickers, t-baggers, shit-talkers. Entitled survivor mains that unhook in your face but whine when you "tunnel" or facecamp... SBMM (skill based match making) is a complete joke. grades don't serve any purpose anymore. 

I love this game but since the boons and dead hard meta, it's too rage inducing to play consistently.

It's an excellent game, I love the whole "survivors vs hunter" concept, with the horror twist. But there are a few things that bug me... first is if you don't find a match u are stuck on a loading/searching screen and have to restart the game. Then once you finally find a game, it could take 5 min to load in. It does get annoying, but if you are true to gaming it really doesn't affect the game itself and the genius behind it. I strongly suggest getting this game if you want to send heebie jeebies down your spine, and maybe have friends get it to play with too!

After first 2 weeks, i gradually disappoined at this rank system. The idea of the game is fancy and the style is well designed. The match is exciting and fun. Great work.
But, like most of competitive games, the ranking system is a nightmare. Perks are so strong for new beginners to against. If you don't reach top level and have all 4 perks unlocked with 3 grade, you can hardly win above 16 rank. I struggled a lot in this lavel because I only have 2 perks. I usually find all my competitors have 4 super rare perks and 4 equipments, which makes the match so imbalance. I should say it is so frustrating  when you cannot catch anyone not because of your skill. I may not be the best but I think that's not always my problem.
I think the ranking system should also consider the equipment and perks between players. Basically there are 2 ways to do that. The first way is always match players with same number of perks. Say, if I have only 1 perk, each survivor in my match should also have 1 or 2 perks at most. The second way is set a limit of total perks for both survivors and killer. Survivors and killers should pick up the perks and equipment before game. There should be a discussion between survivors during that time. In addition, the equipment total should also have a limit. 4 dehook make the killer impossible to hang anyone after 1 minute because there is no hook left except the center base. Then survivors can do anything close to border area without fare because they know they will never be hooked. There are many such "strategies" in current game. I should say I will quit everytime I matched them because I know I cannot win. Does that a good game should be?
Did dev-team think about that when they release new features? Until the game changes I cannot recommend this one really but I wish this game will become better after fix.

Juego 100% Recomendado si quieres pasar un rato de tension con tus amigos.
[h1]Aspectos Positivos[/h1]
[*]Si no te gustan los juegos de terror por que te asustas facilmente no te preocupes,este juego es mas tension que de horror.
[*]Divertido Y mejor aun con amigos.
[*]Gran Cantidad de habilidades para cada personaje.
[*]PersonalizaciÃ³n de personajes e incluso packs de pago para mas aspectos.
[*] Sistema de rangos.
[*]Misiones Diarias y eventos casuales que multiplican los puntos obtenidos en cada partida

[h1] Aspectos Negativos [/h1]
[*] Mala Optimiazion del juego (tengo una 1050 y no puedo jugarlo en ultra debido a que baja repentinamente de 60 a 40 fps)
[*] Problemas de conexion debido a que el host de la partida es el que va de rol de asesino por lo cual de la conexion de ese jugador depende la jugabilidad de los supervivientes
[*] Algunos bugs que dificultan la jugabilidad.
[*] Bug exploit
